value:
The whole town is glittering, like
a starlit sky... And when I hear jingling
bells, it puts a spring in my step!

I'd sure like to deliver a present to
Lloyd and Linus, too...

Check out this turkey leg I got! It's
huuuuge! Want a bite?

I want to write a card to go along
with this present, but...I'm still
studying. Can you help me out?

Have you seen Jaffar's outfit? I made
it for him! Suits him perfectly, don't
you think?

I'm Nino! Brrr! It's so chilly lately...
Oh, that reminds me...don't catch
cold, $Nf says!

I hope everybody loves their
presents!

I'll give it my all, just to see
everybody smile!

Brrr! I'm so cold I can barely
think straight!
A present for me? Gee, thanks!

I'm Nino! I'm here for the winter
festival! Is this the right place?
I've got plenty of smiles to give!

The snow's really coming down,
but I don't even notice... Everyone's
smiles make me toasty warm!$k$pWhat I really love is figuring out
the perfect gifts for the people I care
about...$k$pOver time, the joy spreads from
person to person... And that means
more smiles!$k$pOf course, I want to see YOU smile
too, so I've chosen the perfect gift...
At least, I hope so!$k$pI have to do my best to make sure
the happiness continues even after
the festival ends!
たあっ
当たれ！
いやっ
なんで…
A night of wonders!
Got a present for you!
With all I've got...
From me to you!
I'm not even...sleepy...
Ha ha.
I don't care for winter chills, but I love winter festivals!
Look, the whole town is glittering! How beautiful.
We should all gather around a warm fire and celebrate! That's what my family used to do.
My mother, my father, my brother... So many presents to get, and so little time to get them!
You haven't seen Jaffar around, have you? I've got a present with his name on it.
I think I was pretty good this year. I wonder if I'll get any presents...
Here, I got something for you! Hope you like it...
Naturally!
For me?
Looks like snow!
